mapper.select: select a.bookcode, to_char(a.checkin, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as checkin,to_char(a.checkout, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as checkout, a.mobile, a.name, a.summuch, a.person, a.roomcode, b.name roomname, c.name typename from booking a, room b, roomtype c where a.roomcode = b.roomcode and b.type =#{param3} and b.type=c.typecode and a.checkin between #{param1} and #{param2} and a.checkout between #{param1} and #{param2}
